verses.verse: Now <S%G1161><s%> concerning things sacrificed to idols <S%G1494><s%>: We <S%G2192><s%> know <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> we <S%G2192><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> knowledge <S%G1108><s%>. Knowledge <S%G1108><s%> puffeth up <S%G5448><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> love <S%G26><s%> edifieth <S%G3618><s%>.

<S%G1161><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> any man <S%G5100><s%> thinketh <S%G1380><s%> that he knoweth <S%G1492><s%> anything <S%G5100><s%>, he knoweth <S%G1097><s%> not <S%G3762><s%> yet <S%G3764><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> he ought <S%G1163><s%> to know <S%G1097><s%>;
but <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> any man <S%G5100><s%> loveth <S%G25><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, the same <S%G3778><s%> is known <S%G1097><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

Concerning <S%G4012><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> the eating <S%G1035><s%> of things sacrificed to idols <S%G1494><s%>, we know <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> no idol <S%G1497><s%> is anything <S%G3762><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> there is no3762, Exodus87 God <S%G2316><s%> but1487, 3361 one <S%G1520><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> though <S%G1512><s%> there be <S%G1526><s%> that are called <S%G3004><s%> gods <S%G2316><s%>, whether <S%G1535><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> or <S%G1535><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> earth <S%G1093><s%>; as <S%G5618><s%> there are <S%G1526><s%> gods <S%G2316><s%> many <S%G4183><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> lords <S%G2962><s%> many <S%G4183><s%>;

yet <S%G235><s%> to us <S%G2254><s%> there is one <S%G1520><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, the Father <S%G3962><s%>, of <S%G1537><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> are all things <S%G3956><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> him <S%G846><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%>, Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>, through <S%G1223><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> are all things <S%G3956><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> we <S%G2249><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

Howbeit <S%G235><s%> there is not <S%G3756><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> all men <S%G3956><s%> that knowledge <S%G1108><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> some <S%G5100><s%>, being used <S%G4893><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> now <S%G737><s%> to the idol <S%G1497><s%>, eat <S%G2068><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> of a thing sacrificed to an idol <S%G1494><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> their <S%G846><s%> conscience <S%G4893><s%> being <S%G5607><s%> weak <S%G772><s%> is defiled <S%G3435><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> food <S%G1033><s%> will not <S%G3756><s%> commend <S%G3936><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> to God <S%G2316><s%>: <S%G3777><s%> neither <S%G3777><s%>, if <S%G1437><s%> we eat <S%G5315><s%> not <S%G3361><s%>, are we the worse <S%G5302><s%>; nor <S%G3777><s%>, if <S%G1437><s%> we eat <S%G5315><s%>, are we the better <S%G4052><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> take heed <S%G991><s%> lest by any means <S%G3381><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> liberty <S%G1849><s%> of yours <S%G5216><s%> become <S%G1096><s%> a stumblingblock <S%G4348><s%> to the <S%G3588><s%> weak <S%G770><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> a man <S%G5100><s%> see <S%G1492><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%> who hast <S%G2192><s%> knowledge <S%G1108><s%> sitting at meat <S%G2621><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> an idol <S%G1493><s%>'s temple, will <S%G3618><s%> not <S%G3780><s%> his <S%G846><s%> conscience <S%G4893><s%>, if he is <S%G5607><s%> weak <S%G772><s%>, be emboldened <S%G3618><s%> to eat2068, 1519 things sacrificed to idols <S%G1494><s%>?

For <S%G2532><s%> through <S%G1909><s%> thy <S%G4674><s%> knowledge1108, 622 he that is weak <S%G770><s%> perisheth <S%G622><s%>, the brother <S%G80><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> whose sake <S%G3739><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> died <S%G599><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> thus <S%G264><s%>, sinning <S%G3779><s%> against <S%G1519><s%> the brethren <S%G80><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> wounding <S%G5180><s%> their <S%G846><s%> conscience <S%G4893><s%> when it is weak <S%G770><s%>, ye sin <S%G264><s%> against <S%G1519><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>.

Wherefore <S%G1355><s%>, if <S%G1487><s%> meat <S%G1033><s%> causeth <S%G4624><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> brother <S%G80><s%> to stumble <S%G4624><s%>, I will eat5315, 3756 no <S%G3361><s%> flesh <S%G2907><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> evermore <S%G165><s%>, that <S%G3361><s%> I cause <S%G4624><s%> not my <S%G3450><s%> brother <S%G80><s%> to <S%G2443><s%> stumble <S%G4624><s%>.
